properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stake Island LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River from 20 to 60 nm; Coastal Waters from Boothville LA to Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River to Port Fourchon Louisiana from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island Louisiana out 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 2 at 4:19AM CST until January 3 at 3:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 7 to 9
feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake
Island out 20 NM, Coastal Waters from Boothville LA to
Southwest Pass of the Mississippi River out 20 nm, Coastal
Waters from Stake Island LA to Southwest Pass of the
Mississippi River from 20 to 60 nm, Coastal waters from
Pascagoula Mississippi to Stake Island Louisiana out 20 to 60
NM and Coastal waters from Southwest Pass of the Mississippi
River to Port Fourchon Louisiana from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST FRIDAY
